name: Sepnil Face Mask (Black Colour)
description:
Sepnil Face Mask Black Colour is developed for fashion statement, with comfortable, adjustable and the 3 layered medical grade face mask ensures 99% protection from all sorts of bacterial. It is ISO certified and also tested by SGS and approved by Director General Drug Administration (DGDA) of Bangladesh. Sepnil Face Mask Black Colour is disposable & medical protective.   Sepnil Face Mask Black Colour is the most comfortable and breathable protection throughout the day like our regular Sepnil Face Mask Blue Colour.

name: Savlon Face Mask 1 Box
description:
Savlon Face Mask is a 3 layered mask that protects you from tiny germs, dusts & droplets ensuring Savlon protection while providing easy breathability with less irritation & perfect fitting. Inner Layer: Hypoallergenic soft layer prevents skin irritation. Melt Blown Layer: High density layer made of polypropylene, provides superior filtration against tiny germs ensuring excellent breathability. Outer Layer: Fluid-repellent non-woven fabric protects from harmful particulate matters like dust & droplets.
Savlon Face Mask is a 3 layered mask that protects you from tiny germs, dusts & droplets ensuring Savlon protection while providing easy breathability with less irritation & perfect fitting. Inner Layer: Hypoallergenic soft layer prevents skin irritation. Melt Blown Layer: High density layer made of polypropylene, provides superior filtration against tiny germs ensuring excellent breathability. Outer Layer: Fluid-repellent non-woven fabric protects from harmful particulate matters like dust & droplets.

name: Germnil Surgical Face Mask
description:
The Germnil Surgical Face Mask (50 pcs) offers reliable protection and is designed for comfortable and breathable use. These masks are intended to provide a barrier against bacteria and viruses. They come in a pack of 50, making it a practical option for ongoing personal use.The masks are manufactured in Bangladesh and are tested for safety standards, including ISO certification. They have also been approved by Bangladesh's Directorate General of Drug Administration (DGDA), ensuring their compliance with local regulations​.Ingredients: The masks are made of non-woven fabric, typically with three layers. These layers help filter out airborne particles, offering enhanced protection against germs and viruses​.Use: These masks are intended for single use and are commonly used in healthcare settings, as well as for personal protection in everyday environments. To use, simply wear the mask over your nose and mouth, ensuring a snug fit to prevent exposure to harmful particles​.
The Germnil Surgical Face Mask (50 pcs) offers reliable protection and is designed for comfortable and breathable use. These masks are intended to provide a barrier against bacteria and viruses. They come in a pack of 50, making it a practical option for ongoing personal use.
The masks are manufactured in Bangladesh and are tested for safety standards, including ISO certification. They have also been approved by Bangladesh's Directorate General of Drug Administration (DGDA), ensuring their compliance with local regulations​.
Ingredients: The masks are made of non-woven fabric, typically with three layers. These layers help filter out airborne particles, offering enhanced protection against germs and viruses​.
Use: These masks are intended for single use and are commonly used in healthcare settings, as well as for personal protection in everyday environments. To use, simply wear the mask over your nose and mouth, ensuring a snug fit to prevent exposure to harmful particles​.

name: Turaag Protex Antiviral Face Mask (Serenity-Men)
description:
1. High Performance Mask, as par DGDA Guideline, nonsurgical 3 layer Fabric Mask:  1st layer (Top) – Polyester blend with a Hydrophobic   coating embedded in the fabric for water and oil repellent   properties so that it is hard for the droplet particles to  penetrate.  2nd layer (Middle) – Cotton filtration layer, embedded with   HEIQ Viroblock for antiviral properties. Effective against   99.9% viruses  3rd layer (Inner) – Cotton layer, produced in a technique   such that it acts as an absorbent and is comfortable to   wear. Thus, an cotton absorbent layer.  2. OEKO-Tex Certified – fabric used are harmless to human health  3. HEIQ Vironlock - 99.9% virus inactivity within minutes (anti-viral)  4. Soft adjustable elastic loops for extra comfort, wide face   coverage with chin rest for stability, Head-strap for temporarily   hanging from neck  5. Single zip-lock package  6. Customization: woven label with 02 logo/ screen print  7. Size: adjustable for male and female as well as kids sizes.   Each .size is adjustable to fit securely on the face   8. Washable and easy maintenance  9. Re-usable up to 25 washes  10. Nose Strap for securing the mask according to the shape   required.
